description:
Scenario: Snapshot an instance by specifying metadata with key and value more than 255 characters in length.

Expected Response: 413 (Request Entity Too Large)
Actual Response: 202 (Accepted). The key gets truncated however, the value gets stored entirely.

The 'image_properties' table (defined in Glance Registry) has 'key' field defined as 'varchar(255)' and 'value' is a 'text' field. Therefore the value get stored entirely but the key is truncated.
As per the spec (http://docs.openstack.org/api/openstack-compute/2/content/Create_Image-d1e4655.html) the maximum size of the metadata key and value is 255 bytes each. However, Nova API does not validate the metadata (key value length) provided in while creating an image.
title: Nova API accepts invalid metadata while creating snapshot
